title: Child
description:
A child with no gender specified. This emoji may be used to talk about children in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include ðŸ‘§ Girl and ðŸ‘¦ Boy.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the child emoji is portrayed with a youthful, innocent expression, featuring soft, rounded features and a gentle smile that embodies a sense of wonder. The character is rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and smooth gradients, giving it a warm and approachable feel. This emoji on Apple devices universally symbolizes youth, childhood, family, and new beginnings.
